column5: Latest;Preah------ Sihanouk Province ------:------ A preliminary report from the authorities said that at 5 am on April 27
column7: officials of Preah Sihanouk province’s Camcontrol Branch cooperated with the police to crack down on an economic crime of illegal shrimp importation weighing around 1000 kg.------According to the Camcontrol official
column8: these shrimp sellers came from Vietnam to sell in the Sihanoukville market.------The offending shellfish were brought to Kampot province’s Camcontrol branch to be burned.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/435097
